objects.text:
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS Sensor
• Professional Manual Controls
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Premium Mirrorless Camera - Professional Photography Made Simple
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system with XF mount
• Professional-grade manual control dials for precise settings
• High-performance electronic viewfinder
• Robust metal body construction for durability
• Multiple customizable function buttons for quick access
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for instant photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp captures
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive XF lens lineup
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes for creative expression

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern tech product layout with a bold and eye-catching composition. The background is divided into color-blocked sections with diagonal and circular elements, giving it a dynamic and layered appearance. The topmost large headline (`heading`) uses bright yellow text to emphasize urgency, followed by a vibrant red promotional tag (`tagline`). The product name (`subheading`) stands out in bold white, paired with a concise feature list (`description`) to highlight key selling points. Below, a call-to-action (`cta`) is layered on a red button shape (`cta_button_background`). The discounted price (`price`) is prominently displayed in yellow, paired with a promotional teaser (`promotional_text`) and urgency note (`urgency_text`). A high-quality image of the product (`product_image`) complements the design and enhances visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#1A2A4A`
- Navy: `#0F172A`
- Royal Blue: `#1E3A8A`
- Mustard Yellow: `#FFD700`
- Crimson Red: `#E63946`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, predominantly featuring a matte black body that brings a sleek, professional aesthetic. The primary color is jet black (#000000), accented by subtle metallic greys (#4F4F4F) on the lens rings and knobs. The white text labeling (e.g., “FUJIFILM”, “X-T10”) uses pure white (#FFFFFF), offering sharp contrast for clarity. Small details, like the red aperture indicator (#FF3B3B) and golden lens marking (#F4BB3B), add highlights that guide visibility without overwhelming the main design. A suitable banner can use this monochromatic base palette complemented with accent shades to reflect sophistication and precision.
